title: DetectorCalibration
description: This element describes a procedure used to measures the performance of the Dectector used to to Acquire this experimental Image.

subCategoriesOrder.IntensityCalibration: This describes the procedure(s) that were used for excitation and detector calibration and the resulting calibration results.
subCategoriesOrder.DetectorCalibration: This element describes a procedure used to measures the performance of the Dectector used to to Acquire this experimental Image.
subCategoriesOrder.IntensityCalibrationTool: This element is a reference to the tool if any used to perform this calibratin procdure
subCategoriesOrder.IntensityCalibrationReport: This element refers to any File containing a report generated by the Calibration Software referred to in Calibration procedure.
subCategoriesOrder.DetectorCalibrationImage: This is an empty element that refers to an Image (typically a z-stack) obtained as part of this Detector Calibration Procedure used in this instance and Acquired using the same Instrument and Settings employed to acquire the experimental Image this calibration refers to.
